net.minecore

Class Miner

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecore.Miner

  • public class Miner
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores data for a player.
    Author:
    The Numenorean

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Miner(java.lang.String playerName)
      Creates a player with a blank configuration and the given player name
